column3:
The 
imposition  and 
levying  of 
rates  by  an  Urban  Council  must  be
The  approval  of  the  Minister  shall  be  required  where  there  is  to  be  an
increase in the quantum of rates;

The  approval  of 
the  Minister  shall  not  be 
required 
for 
the  annual
imposition of rates if there is no increase from the previous year.
